website_summaries.verdict: Highly durable choice for the widest variety of phones including iPhone 8, 7, 6S and 6.
pros: Most users say this product protected their screens from shattering when they dropped their phones
cons: Like all screen protectors, best to use with a case for edge-to-edge protection

customer_reviews.title: Bad choice for the iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: This does not adhere to the edges of an iPhone 8 well at all. I would not buy this if you have an 8. I’ve had no issues with the same brand for the X, but there must be a contour to the screen on the edge of the 8 that it just doesn’t work well with
customer_reviews.author: Julie L.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit right!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone 7. I have purchased multiple times this type of screen protectors, this specific brand 3 times last yea for my phone. Now I’m not sure what is different from last year, or if this is a new version or what’s going on, but they don’t fit right, I have the edge all around does not touch the screen and gives the effect of a white frame all around and instantly accumulates dust. I’ve never had this issue before and in the past I have replaced more than 6 protectors between my phone and my wife’s phone so I kind of know what I’m talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Munchies

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: These are complete garbage, they crack and break way too easily. It makes no sense, they fit the phone just fine and do not overlap the sides, yet both screen savers only lasted a few days before I noticed cracks across the entire length. I also have an outer phone case installed, which does not come close to touching these screen protectors, but help keep anything from ever touching these protectors. I suggest trying a different brand before using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe V.

customer_reviews.title: replacement was sent about 30 days later
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with installation, the paperwork said to contact the company. I sent an email to the company asking for assistance and did not get a response. The screen has scratched in just a couple of weeks. Poor quality product, zero customer support but they talk a big warranty, but it’s just hype. A return message would have been nice. Waste of money I have one screen that has bubbles, the other one has more scratches than my 1 year old screen protector. To follow up I received a replacement about 30 days after my last post.
customer_reviews.author: JoeNolan26

customer_reviews.title: Nobody else compares
customer_reviews.text: Look, I’ve used techmatte for all of my family’s phones and tablets. They do the job well and are easy to install. I’ve never had an issue......until I got my iPhone 8. Tried the techmatte like usual, bubble around the edges both attempts, got the free replacements, same thing on those. Even bought several different brands but the same issue. Bought this product again, same issue! Finally I messaged techmatte and told them my issue. They told me some IPhone 8’s are a bit different and I’m suffering from “halo”. They sent me two replacements that are designed to eliminate the problem. First try, PERFECT install! Awesome product and even better company.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R

customer_reviews.title: Kind of "meh"
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a new iPhone 8 and wanted to put a screen protector on before I used it so I ordered these. I wouldn't really say they fit the phone that well and could be better. The actual screen display is as wide as the protector covers. You can see where an edge didn't fully adhere to the screen so that's already messed up. I'll update later on with the durability and how well that lifted edge stays attached or if it pulls up quickly with use. I'm hoping the case I ordered for it will help hold down the screen protector a little bit though so we'll see!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Must have for quality, AND customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector is very good quality. All tools needed come in the box for a good and easy installation. After few months and unknown reason, the screen bubbled and cracked on the right side. I contacted TechMatte, and almost instantly I received a very nice, courteous, and open minded response. They asked me to send a pic of the screen what I did. Few minutes later they told me that they would ship me a new one. 2 days later I received a brand new screen. I will purchase my next screens with them in the future, I respect so much this kind of business, it is how you win clients for life.
customer_reviews.author: Arno

customer_reviews.title: Scratches too easily
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these amFilm screen protectors from among the hundreds of other options based on their "Amazon's Choice" recommendation to replace a year-old protector which was beginning to lift around one corner of my iPhone. Application of the amFilm protector was quick, easy and without a bubble in sight. I was impressed with how well it went on and how good it looked once installed. Unfortunately, this screen protector scratches much too easily and within a week was showing multiple scratches whereas my prior protector was pretty much scratch-free during the year I used it. So minus two stars for durability which is why one would buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: W from VA

customer_reviews.title: Good one, as expected
customer_reviews.text: I got it today, it was in great condition, fit well as expected (I have an iPhone 6S) The only problem was the hideous dust particles I just couldn't get rid off. It is very resistant, I placed it and remove it like 3 times trying to get ride the tiny dust evils particles and the protector didn't get damaged nor the glue. I think it was a bad technic I used therefor I ended with some dust
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: I drop my phone all the time and throw it in my purse with keys and a bunch of other stuff. This screen protector is a fantastic barrier for my phone! I have been using it for a few months, I treat my phone pretty rough and I haven’t had any scratches on the protector yet. It was relatively easy to put on too. I rarely put on screen protectors and this one was not difficult. I do not have any bubbles or open spots, there is 2 in the package so these will last me a while!! Awesome value and product
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: You're nuts if you buy a more expensive brand!
customer_reviews.text: This product made my iPhone 7 look brand new again. I was at my phone carrier and inquired about the price of the name brand screen protectors they carry. Needless to say, the price was ridiculous even after they they offered a 25 % discount. I came home and went straight to Amazon and found this brand. The reviews were good and so I purchased one. It arrived quickly, was easy to put on my phone and the price was perfect! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Washington

customer_reviews.title: So Easy / The best yet
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen protector; you get two so if you crack one you don't have to wait for a new one. The installation was the easiest I've ever had for a screen protector and the cost can't be beat. I've had more expensive ones however, when they cracked I had to wait for the new one. With this set I have a new one at the ready (not that I'm planning on dropping my phone but it's always a possibility). I had another kind for my new iphone 8 and had issues installing and it never quite covered the edges. Also I love the hole for the camera. A nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: you could see this as a poor product because the screen protector cracked
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my phone the day after I installed this screen protector. As you can see in the photo, the protector cracked but my screen didn't! Now, you could see this as a poor product because the screen protector cracked, which means I'll have to buy this pretty often. But I'd rather it crack than my phone's screen! I'm not usually clumsy but it does worry me that I'll (possibly) have to continuously purchase this every time I drop my phone, which could be looked at as a con. This is why I rated it 4 out of 5 stars. Overall, I'm pretty satisfied and will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: shandajeanette

customer_reviews.title: I would not purchase again...
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector has easy to follow instructions, but some form of template on the outside film to line up the hole for the Home Button and camera/speaker area would be nice as it is difficult to see (that’s with all screen protectors as it has yet to be done). The screen protector’s size is actually about 2-3 mm short around the whole screen not providing complete screen protection as it does not cover to the edges or under standard bumper cases. The shipping was fast as should be expected with a paid Prime account, but even with the expected delayed shipping times it still arrived within 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Oran & Traci

customer_reviews.title: Easiest screen protection to apply
customer_reviews.text: The product came with all the necessary materials needed to apply the screen protector successfully - the film protector, wet and dry wipes, dust removal stickers, squeegee, and a small piece of cloth for finishing touches. There is also a step-by-step instructions, written in very easy to understand English language, with some helpful tips for a bubble-free installation. Best of all , it came as a set of two. A 100% satisfaction guarantee accompanied the product, although I don't it as necessary but just as well, it gives you the feeling of receiving your money's worth. I highly recommend the product and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Bet you didn't think you could be this jazzed about a screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I cannot review this screen protector more enthusiastically without sounding a bit unhinged. Trust me and look no further. This is what you should buy. I have been an iPhone owner for almost 10 years and this is by far the EASIEST screen protector to apply. It practically applied itself-- with NO BUBBLES! It's also by far the best screen protector I have ever had. It is CLEAR and there is no weird clouding or change in visibility at different angles. I would never use my phone without a screen protector and case, but this screen protector lets my phone screen look as Apple intended-- super sharp. Also, I didn't even realize the box includes TWO! I am thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Marielle

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product - Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of waiting until long after the return window to try out this product. When I finally did open the box, one of the protectors was scratched, so that was a waste. The second one I followed the directions exactly (even watched the company's video for how to install), and the screen still did not completely stick on the edges. Within two days, lint was able to get under the screen and so finally I just took it off and gave up on this protector. Big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: A great product that I can highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because the original Anker glass I was so happy with no longer seems to be available. Since their site pointed me to these, I figured I'd give them at try. So far it's working great. I've had it on for about 10 days and complete forget that it's there. No bubbles or lifting edges. Clear, easy to follow instructions. A great product that I can highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hutchin

customer_reviews.title: SAVED MY PHONE! The best Protective glass on phone I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best protective glass I’ve ever used! Easy to install, came with cleaning kit and 2 tempered glasses. I put it on my phone, 2 days later dropped my cell and it completely saved it. The drop would have destroyed My cellphone if it wasn’t for this glass screen protector. Will never buy any other brand besides this one from now on. I HIGHLY HIGHLY RECOMMEND! Also- I’ve used many diff screen protectors on different phones throughout the years, this one is by far the best in ease of installation, strongest protection, and completely clear and smudge proof. I can’t rave enough about this brand‘s product!!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Warranty covers screen protector, NOT your phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed fine like every other screen protector I've bought for my family of phones. This screen protector is a complete waste of time and false sense of security. 1 drop on concrete at 3 ft height (tough test) but not a bit of protection. Lodged complaint with company and the response shows their expectation (We are very sorry to hear that your screen protector and phone screen have cracked. While our screen protector does offer extra protection against daily wear and tear, it does not protect against every drop, scratch, or bump; especially those that are excessive or high-impact in nature. We again apologize but, our warranty specifically covers only the screen protector itself. ) WOW, what a waste
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: After getting my new iPhone and case, my daughter recommended purchasing a screen protector. I chose this one because of the great reviews. Last week I dropped my phone while taking a walk. It looked like the screen was cracked but thankfully it was only the screen protector that was damaged. I was so grateful-the screen protector really worked! They send two protectors in a box so immediately I replaced the old one. The directions are easy to follow and they even include a cloth to remove dust and cleansing and drying cloths to prepare your screen before placement. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K Lipsky

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product came with 2 screen protectors. I really liked how easy it was to put on, and it even came with cleaning wipes to clean your phone before you put the protector on. The only thing that I didn't like (and this might just be my fault, not sure) three days after I put the protector on I found a scratch on the protector, but it did not go through to the phone (which means it's doing it's job). I was just bummed out to find a scratch on the new product and I know I didn't drop it. May have just got scratched from something I was not aware of. But all together, great product. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Panek

customer_reviews.title: Sides does not stick, static from peeling attracts dust and fuzz
customer_reviews.text: Makes your phone feel safe from scratches and cracks, but you'll have to learn to live with have little pieces of dust in your screen and edges that are not flush. Followed all the rules, dusted my screen 4 times in a moist room. But as soon as I peel off the first layer of the screen protector to expose the adhesive side... the static electricity pull fuzz from lord knows where onto it. Stuck with some visible fuzz between the screen protector and the iPhone screen. Also no matter how I aligned the screen protector... the edge will never stick. Because of this, a lot of dust collects between the edges of the screen protector and my iPhone case.
customer_reviews.author: Vizar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Screen Protector for my IPhone 8. The phone is so beautiful I did not want to put it a bulky Otter box enclosure of other protectors. I hope I never have to test it for it's endurance. So far, upon applying I got almost 0 bubbles and those bubbles are unnoticeable. I just followed the directions using the guide included to press out the bubbles. If I had not been in such a hurry I may have had no bubbles..
customer_reviews.author: Princess Lea

customer_reviews.title: Not touch sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new otter box case for my iPhone. Their screen protectors not very touch sensitive, so I purchased this one since it touted its thinness and touch sensitivity. I installed according to instructions, I don’t see any air bubble. The touch sensitivity is very poor. I have to press very hard rather with the light touch I am use to. It almost feels like there is a gap between the glass protector and screen or like the protector is thick plastic rather than glass. I have to hit keys several times. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Dglenn

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Easy To Install
customer_reviews.text: The best experience ever to install a new cover that i ever came across. I'm not the handiest person around but this process was so simple I was so happy with this product. I had not one issue with the kit that I purchased with two covers and all the accessories that come with it. A lot cheaper than going to the phone store to have them charge you at least $20 to purchase and put on. Save your self a trip, buy it on Amazon and do it yourself, you won't be disappointed. P.S. I ordered another kit because I know my family will want me to put one on for them.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Mags

customer_reviews.title: Imperfect, thick, cracked quickly -- but cheap and functional
customer_reviews.text: The size of the protector size was slightly smaller than the screen on my iPhone 8-Plus, so there are rainbow edge effects. The home button cut out was also slightly off center. Neither a huge deal, but annoying. The glass is very thick and changes the feel of the screen--but works just fine. More significantly, mine cracked within a few months of use. No damage or dropping that I am aware of. (Certainly none that would have put the screen at risk.) I have left it on to prevent scratches from keys in my pocket, but I wouldn't purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: A Doctor in Ann Arbor

customer_reviews.title: Edges didn’t adhere!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these prior to this purchase and they have been great. I bought another pack, and knowing how tricky to avoid dust becoming introduced I took all precautions and laid the protector on perfectly with no dust! Very happy with that. What I’m not happy with is that since I applied them so meticulously the ashes failed to adhere on two of the corners and 1/4 of one side on the phone. I laid weights on the protector for 2 days and the edges although they seemed to have adhered, slowly came unstuck in the same spots. I used all the recommended cleaners that came with the kit so idk - kinda sucks that it’s not perfect....
customer_reviews.author: G - OFF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and incredibly strong
customer_reviews.text: Rebought this for my mom's iPhone. It was even easier to install then the previous iteration and it looks less noticeable on the screen -- colors look sharp and crisp. Best of all, with a great case (we use caseology), if your phone slams on a hard surface and the screen protector cracks it protects your screen on impact and saves it from damage. I've had the same screen protector on my iPhone for 2.5 years and I'm going to purchase this amFilm Glass screen protector for my iPhone too! I def recommend this for anyone needing a screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: EHunter

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: However, after the easy installation, this screen protector has air pockets all around the edges. This was “specifically” made to avoid that from happening. That is not reality. It’s made just like every other tempered glass manufacture offered on Amazon, but this is the worst of them all. I was issued a refund, but wanted you all to know to look elsewhere. Try Omotion Glass Screen Protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the service of replacing the glass protectors through verizon for a lot of money. My phone fell recently while passing it to my daughter on the pavement cracking the glass protector I previously had from Verizon. Since we are in quarantine I ordered these for a much cheaper price and easily installed myself. It is a relief knowing I can buy these a reasonable price (for 2) and install them myself when needed. Verizon makes you think it's something that only they can do smh... I love these protectors, thank you, my phone is safe and looks good again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Shattered on first drop & sharp!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first 9H tempered glass screen cover that I’ve had shatter. My phone fell out of my pocket, from chair height, onto a small pebble sized rock at our campground. It shattered in 1/2” radius around the home button then cracked into spider veins upward. My biggest disappointment is that it was sharp enough to cut me! Before the mishap, the screen was clear which is why I gave it two stars. Definitely the least durable of any screen protector I’ve owned, which is what counts!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product. I love the glass protectors for my iPhone. The last one cost me an arm and a leg, with the promise of a replacement when damaged. After spending all that money, I saw that the only way to get a future replacement due to damage, was to register with so much technical information it would have taken me hours to find it all. This product is not only cost friendly, it is easy to install, and you get a spare! I see it is also manufactured in the USA. So I gave it a 5 star rating for all these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: You get 2 screen protectors with this purchase. You also get perfect instructions and everything you need to easily install this thing. It really was simple to install this protector...I encountered zero problems. If you can't install this without any problems then you haven't read the instructions or you just can't install anything. The protector brought the screen back to life after replacing a cracked and scratched protector of another brand. Best of all we still have another protector in case anything goes wrong or we buy another phone. I'm sure you will be pleased with this protector.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca shelton

customer_reviews.title: It's great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: What else can you say about it? 5 stars because.. it fits? Didn't give us much of a problem, not much bubbling to be squeezed out during installation but then again, maybe requires a girl's soft touch to get it right. You don't really need to watch the video on how to put it on, it's pretty self explanatory. Anyone who screws this up is most likely dudes that are like gorillas and just bang stuff around all day, don't know how to be gentle, patient and precise with the film lol..
customer_reviews.author: Supergood

customer_reviews.title: easy install & friendly service
customer_reviews.text: First time user and installation was a breeze. After about a week, an air bubble at one of the corner cutouts around the big home button, but fortunately it has not spread (so far) up into the screen area to interfere with the view. Pleasantly surprised by friendly followup from seller and upon registering for warranty. TIP: While upgrading our phone protection, we also upgraded service--Verizon (largest US wireless network) has a new upstart discount subsidiary at Visible.com that presently has unlimited talk/text/data/hotspot for $40/month (fees included) and no contract! Use code referral code wTz9G for $20 off new service and check out promo for up to $200 prepaid mastercard!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: The weight of the tempered glass pulls the glass off of the two installation tabs with the protective lining if you take too long lining up the home button cutout to the mike cutout. After that happens, installation is quite difficult. My 1st glass attempt, the tabs peeled off the glass and botched the install. My 2nd glass attempt, the tabs started to come off and I used my fingers to align the glass with half-assed results. There were two corner areas that would not adhere (because of my fingers I would guess). Overall, the clearness of the glass is excellent. If it wasn't for the tabs pulling off to soon, I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jim466

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this product at all, there are 2 in the packaging and the first one cracked while trying to put It on which was frustrating after you clean the face of your phone, Just to have It break from simply trying to position It correctly. I keep my phone in a pocket in my purse and only have to replace my phone every 4/5 years bc I’m so careful and to have now this newer screen lifting with bubbles on It is ridiculous. No I won’t be buying another nor recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: char gore

customer_reviews.title: Good, but One Glaring Issue on iPhone 7
customer_reviews.text: This glass screen protector is very slick to the touch and resists finger prints as advertised. I was very pleased with the installation kit which has everything you need to get a good, dust-free installation. Screen feel and touch response is no different than when I used the phone without the screen protector. The only problem with this product is that it does not cover the entire screen of my iPhone 7. Close, but not quite. If they had only made it a few millimeters longer and wider, it would have fit great. Not sure why they made it this way. Still a good screen protector overall, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ben G

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 this is worth buying and is high quality.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the first product I’ve picked up from amFilm and as such I had no doubts I was getting quality. I’ve dropped it enough to where it should’ve broke(not super hard, but frequently) and I’ve barely gotten a nick in it. I have been trying to give like all of my friends the 2nd one and nobody wants it for some reason. I don’t feel like I’ll ever need it with the quality from this one. The other I got from them were for my Nintendo Switch and that one hasn’t so much as scratched in nearly 3 years. I can’t recommend this company for their products enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kaguya

customer_reviews.title: I keep coming back.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought multiple screen protectors, but I keep coming back to this one. It is super easy to install, IF you follow the directions. Trust me if you try installing it the way you think it should be installed, you'll mess it up. It protects the screen so well, the first time I dropped my phone nothing happened to the screen or screen protector, but one day my friend was taking a photo and dropped my phone and cracked the screen protector, the drop was very hard and I was super sure it had cracked the phone screen too. To my surprise it was A -OK, thanks to the protector.
customer_reviews.author: E.CASAS

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit well for iPhone 7 and iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: We ordered and used this protector for our both our kids. One kid has IPhone 7 and the other has IPhone 8. On both phones the screen protector doesn’t fit well. All around, edges, do not adhere well to the curve of the phones. They had both been telling us that it didn’t fit well and today we were outdoors during a particularly windy and dusty day - Dust got in all around edges. Again, not a good fit or maybe it’s the adhesive? Either way, they will continue to use the protector until another one we just ordered arrives.
customer_reviews.author: E. Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Bad adhesive, other problems. Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the card included for squeezing out air bubbles is utterly useless. After finally getting the bubbles out and completing installation, I discover a scratch in the adhering side of the glass. Great. So I started over with the second one (wasteful). After another annoying 20 minutes, I get the second one installed and bubble-less. But the edges don’t stay adhered! It looks like crap, and I completed the instructions with near- surgical cleanliness and precision so I know this wasn’t user error
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Dropped my phone face down...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this last night and I quickly slapped it on. Well tried to...you need some patience to make sure all of the dust won't get trapped underneath it! Advice: try adhering it in the bathroom with a hot shower going and let the steam help you! Later that night, after drinking and while waiting for my tacos to come, my phone slipped out of my hands and it fell face down on tile (about 4 feet). My phone was completely fine! Nothing happened to the screen protector or the case or the phone! I'm sure the case helped absorbed some shock too. So far so good...fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good little screen protector
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful little screens. Easy to put on once you’re not stupid about it. Someone on here wrote a review about all the bubbles. Perhaps they did what I did and tried to put the wrong film on. There are 3 parts. Once I did it correctly, I got three phones protected. As for how they will hold up remains to be seen. My grandchildren seem to defy any protection. Knowing that, I just ordered 2 more sets. Someone else stated that the edges would not stick. That is true on the iPhone 7. It has curved edges. There is nothing that can be done about that. But is is such a small thing.
customer_reviews.author: Oma X 12

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with excellent guarantee!
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these on the phone for a LONG time - dropped phone on concrete patio stones and the saver broke, but the screen was just fine. I found the package with the 2 of 2 screen saver in it and also found the paperwork and guarantee that they will replace the item for nearly any reason - including user error or breakage. I just sent in a little form online and a picture of the broken one - took all of 2 minutes - to get a replacement box on the way. Very nice! Thank you for a great product and great guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Reader, Tx

customer_reviews.title: Decrease in quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a few of these for myself and friends. They’ve always been cheap and reliable. I don’t know if they changed something recently, but the quality has gone WAY down. After 8 months the protective glass on mine cracked. I bought a replacement pack and within 1 day, a new crack. I thought it was a fluke and applied the 2nd in the package. It lasted a week and cracked without any trauma to the screen. It cracked while in my purse. I’m disappointed, will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage
customer_reviews.text: Spent almost 30 minutes trying to install it. This is the 4th glass screen protector I’ve installed and they have all come out perfect that my friends ask me to do theirs. This protector does not seal the edges and leaves air along the curved portion of the iPhone 8. I even used a heat gun to strengthen the seal and work the edges and it still wouldn’t make contact. The entire install kit is cheap and the dust stickers are 1cm wide. What are you supposed to even do with that? Waste of money. Not sure what I expected for such a cheap price but I’m definitely not ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go-to screen protector
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this for their phones - it is a glass screen protector, so when it breaks it is the screen protector that breaks as opposed to the phone screen breaking. I have bought these more than once because one daughter has real butterfingers when it comes to her phone. She can usually use it for 6-9 months before getting a large crack and wanting to replace it, and each package comes with 2 protectors on it so the package lasts a while. Soooo worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: HeidiM

customer_reviews.title: This works really well
customer_reviews.text: Like another reviewer, I had an accident. I accidentally squished my phone between my hand and the side of my couch and was horrified to see a crack. I am a bit embarrassed that it took several months before I remembered that I'd put this screen protector on my phone. The crack had continued spreading and I was terribly frustrated. I'd never broken a phone before! I peeled off the screen protector to see the damage up close- and it was all on the protector! I'm back, buying another one (I put the second one on my husband's phone). It saved us having to replace my screen or iPhone 7.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie C-S

customer_reviews.title: Quality screen protector
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a high quality screen protector and is a bit easier to install than some others I’ve used. That being said it can still be tricky to install and you should follow the instructions exactly. It’s just barely wide enough to cover the screen on an iPhone 8 so be sure to align it carefully before placing. It comes in a 2 pack so if you mess it up the first time you’ll have a 2nd chance. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Barry PDX

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and super clear
customer_reviews.text: Wow.. best screen film ever! I love how the tap(or handle) on each side of the film helps adjust it precisely onto the screen! I’m so happy that I don’t have to put up with poorly stuck screen protector whenever I use my phone anymore. And how the film attached itself as soon as I placed it over the screen was amazing and mesmerizing almost lol. Also, it is incredibly clear, clearer than any other screen protectors that I’ve used so far. It is so clear that for one second I thought I don’t have the film over the screen yet.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good screen protector for iphones
customer_reviews.text: My daughters are pretty tough on phones, so I try to keep a supply of good screen protectors in stock. These are good ones. The curved edge on the newer iPhones mean that unless you get it centered exactly perfectly you may have a little air space on the very edge (less than 1mm) at some point. It has happened to me before, but you can't see it when the screen is on. These are good screens, with the right supplies to assist you with a good installation.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Edges Do Not Apply on iPhone SE 2020
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this for the iPhone SE 2020. The edges of it do not apply down all the way, leaving white streaks around the edges. I'm sure it wouldn't protect against drops as a result, and dust will get in there. It sounds like other people have had the same problem with iPhone 8s. This product is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Henry W.

customer_reviews.title: BEST SCREEN PROTECTOR
customer_reviews.text: This is my third or fourth time buying these exact screen protectors. I have dropped my phone multiple times and the protectors have never let me down. They are affordable , easy to apply, and they come with all the tools necessary to have a clean application (screen cleaners, dust removal, hard card to get bubbles out, and more). It also comes with a warranty. I will continue to buy from this company when I get screen protectors. I’m not just saying this either , I rave about these to my friends and family who spend $20-30 on screen protectors at the large stores. You won’t regret getting these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product first!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my first screen protector and couldn’t understand why people who I met complained about bubbles in their screen protector. It just seemed easy. Eventually I needed another back and bought a different brand and I realized what other people were complaining about... two more disastrous brands of screen protectors later, I rebought these and their PERFECT. I’ll never buy from another company. No bubble issues, installation is a breeze, easy to reposition, and I can drop my phone a hundred times with zero damage to the screen.
customer_reviews.author: historyglobe

customer_reviews.title: Nice it comes with two. Must have for your phone!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on even if you didn’t read the instructions carefully the first time. It comes with two which is even better because you will end up using both. I wish I put this on my phone sooner because I already dropped my phone and had to pay $80 for someone else to fix it. I have it on now. I dropped my phone and the protector cracked instead of my phone thank goodness. For such a low cost it’s worth it to protect your phone. Touch screen works just fine too with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: With out a doubt this is the best and easiest screen protector I have ever installed. The directions were simple and easy to follow and resulted in a perfect first time installation. I also loved the suggestion to install the shield in the bathroom after steaming up the room with hot water to remove all the dust particles first. What a brilliant idea, it worked great!! In the past I have always had small bits of dust land on my screen before applying the protector resulting in small annoying burbles. Hopefully it will be scratch resistant and last at least a year and protect my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Frink

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I am always skeptic about screen protectors cause any at the cell phone store cost 50 bucks!! I was very very pleased with these. I bought them for my three kids a while ago and they have not broke yet! I ended up ordering more and replacing my 50 dollar store bought one that was cracked to pieces. Great Product and easy to install. The installation process is nice cause it provides extra tabs on the sides to line up the screen and not guess and pull up when you jack it up like other brands. Good product..Great Price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Nice protector, wish it came with a frame guide
customer_reviews.text: Works well and correct cut outs but I wish it came with one of those frame guides that helps you align the protector on it. I definitely had unsealed edges that seem to be an issue on these iPhone 8 screen protectors. I even tried another brand but same issue. I ended up watching a you tube video on putting oil around the edges. I was skeptical but figured it wouldn’t hurt the phone and I just used a little avocado oil. Worked like magic and continues to be sealed around the edges and doesn’t appear to be any leftover oil. So now I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Last time I bought a screen protector, it was a thin sheet of some kind of thin, flexible plastic material. Not very durable and protected against scratches only. These are indestructible glass. Well not completely indestructible. I field tested them by dropping from different heights. I could have cracked screen without protection. Both protector and screen survived without damage except the protector developed some splitting around finger print reader over time. Didn’t affect the protection. I’m very happy with price for two pieces and quality of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Buck

customer_reviews.title: Protected phone when dropped
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase as I forgot they had a great replacement warranty. Phone was dropped onto concrete step, shattered screen protector but completely protected phone. I actually brought phone in for glass repair, but when tech pulled off screen protector the phone was intact. I’ve had high end screen protectors on other phones, but realized this one is just as good, at a much better price. Very easy to install and small bubble worked itself out.
customer_reviews.author: Happiernow

customer_reviews.title: Quality screen protector at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a screen protector last as long as this one has! I am very impressed with how easy it was to put on and how well it resists scratches. It drives me crazy to have bubbles under the screen and there are 0 bubbles with this protector. The edges are nice and smooth and the holes match perfectly with my phone. Don't waste your time comparing different ones on Amazon - buy these & you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Hicks

customer_reviews.title: I've bought many of these
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many of these since I got this version of my iPhone, but only because every time it gets scratched I go nuts and have to change it so my screen is perfect. The price is great and it's really easy to apply. The only thing that kind of annoys me is that the edge of the screen sort of goes over the curve of the phone's screen and doesn't lay flat on the very edges. That's my only issue but otherwise it's very clear and my phone's actual screen has never broken. They're very protective.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Navon

customer_reviews.title: Best adherence ever!
customer_reviews.text: Huh. A screen protector that’s actually easy to apply. For the first time, I didn’t have any problems getting the product positioned, and not a single bubble formed! I don’t think it was my technique that suddenly got better. I think the adherent Just works well. Also, the last few screen updates protectors I’ve bought from well-known companies have had to be returned because there was no sticky coating on the glass or film! This package com s with 2 protectors and worked the first time. Will definitely buy again. Other factors are clarity seems good, feels good, responsive touch. Won’t know about actual screen protection for awhile as I don’t purposely throw my phone around.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Spence

customer_reviews.title: DIY-Friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is my second (or third) time ordering the product. It honestly does the job it is designed to do, at a great price. I have had to replace several cracked screens, but I will take that over a busted iPhone. No, I do not bother the manufacturers to give me gimmes. Also, I will be the first to admit that I have gotten better at aligning these things! I have watched Ver#$#@n employees install items identical to these, at 4x and 5x more cost. I will take this one every single time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Drawdy

customer_reviews.title: At last: easy to install protector
customer_reviews.text: I have installed numbers of screen protectors over the years, and it has uniformly been a frustrating task--enough so that I sometimes gave up and paid Apple to do it for me. This particular one stands out in that respect: It came with a cleaning cloth, the usual cardboard applicator, but something novel: a tacky-paper tab to pick up the last traces of dust. It seems to have worked: I've never applied one with less difficulty, or a more satisfactory result. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Beach004

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 6 - Corners do not adhere well. Have had this issue before.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time using this brand of screen protector on several different iphones 6-7. The issue I've experienced nearly every time is that the corners do not seal well and they begin to peel up immediately or days later. I have not had this issue with other brands. I've had this happen on a new iphone and more common on iphones where a protector was previously installed. I clean the screen "thoroughly". I am very meticulous about applying these but for some reason this brand just does not adhere as well as another leading brand on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Less Fearful to Drop My Phone
customer_reviews.text: I paid $75 for a similar product through a phone store, then dropped my phone days later. The screen saver cracked, but the phone was saved. This was the proof that it would work, so I bought this and it’s great! The phone store made it seem like it was a magic process to install the glass protector... I assure you the only magic was how they got me to pay $75 for something that I could purchase here and install myself. This was a great value for an easy to use protector - and it was a two pack! I’ll be sure to tell everyone to save their money and buy from here.
customer_reviews.author: Awinters

customer_reviews.title: Never been paid for a review
customer_reviews.text: I'm really conflicted whether to give this product a 4 or 5 star rating. It came with a kit for installation which includes a glass cleaner, a paper to dry the glass, a card to remove bubbles, even small stickers to remove the dust. I did find it difficult to align because it is exactly the same size as the screen. As one reviewer said, that may be because the screen is tempered glass and the iPhone screen is curved so can't be any wider. Because of this, I may go with plexiglass next time. So, 4 stars for width (sorry if that's not fair) and 5 stars for the accompanying install kit.
customer_reviews.author: EBLy

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months back. I haven’t had any problems with it. Then yesterday I tripped and fell with my phone in my hand. My phone hit pavement and I was sure the screen was going to be cracked really bad. When I looked at it there was only a few cracks and it turns out they were only on the screen protector! I was so impressed I bought another set. I didn’t have the 2nd one because I had put it on my daughter’s phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.  So glad I chose this one!
customer_reviews.text: I was leery of buying a screen protector from anywhere other than the Verizon store where I got my iPhone. I purchased one before and it got bubbles and eventually came off. This one was packaged neatly with VERY easy and simple instructions with pictures to follow. It just took me a couple of minutes to install an invisable screen protector that protects my investment without hurting the touch screen sensitivity at all! It looks and feels professionally installed, no bubbles, works awesome, and was so quick and easy. I love it when things actually work as well as promised!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: No Zero Bubble As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Although I watched the video multiple times prior to installation and also followed the written instructions during installation, I was unable to obtain a bubble-free installation. After applying a second screen protector, I had far less bubbles (only one bubble on second installation versus four bubbles on the first installation), but it was still not a bubble-free installation as expected. I assume after having several installations completed, eventually installation will be bubble-free, but I'm not willing to invest the money to purchase more amFilm screen protectors to achieve a zero bubble install as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Lady

customer_reviews.title: Durable- Does it’s job- Money Saver
customer_reviews.text: Love! I’ve used these before . My phone has been dropped so many times with no damage to the protecting screen. It’s very durable. However one day my 9 yr old dropped my phone on a cement floor ... hard- screen facing down . Thankfully I had the screen protector on. The protector was cracked in 4 diff places . I was worried what my actual screen was going to look like , however when I removed the protector, my screen was perfect. This product saved me from replacing my phone and spending hundreds of dollars in doing so. I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Khrystal

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles galore
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know I could be so annoyed by something as simple as a screen protector. I needed to replace my old one after it rescued my phone after a fall so I went with this brand because they were highly rated. I’ve never had issues with applying screen protectors before. Somehow my first attempt had such infuriatingly massive bubbles that I figured it was my fault and I would just try the second screen protector since it came in a 2 pack. It also gave me massive bubbles. I followed the instructions exactly as they’re written. I guess I’ll be ordering a screen protector from a different brand now seeing as my phone screen is now a blotchy trainwreck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best screen protector I ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother's iPhone after buying one for my Samsung Galaxy and my Husbands iPad. My husband came home from a flight to Florida, fighting mad because TSA broke his iPad. They pulled it out on an inspection and jammed it back, shattering the screen. We were about to head to the apple store for a new iPad when I realized it was only the screen protector that had broken. It did its job! The iPad was completely unharmed. We bought another screen protector for it and I'll never use another for any device. They are so easy to put on, since it isn't flimsy. No bubbles. No scratches through the plastic. Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.author: shauna

customer_reviews.title: Even the iPhone genius was amazed how well it worked
customer_reviews.text: I had dropped my iPhone, and the screen appeared to be cracked, so I took it in for replacement. It didn't occur to me that the crack was only in the screen protector, and when I removed it, voila! The phone screen as fine. The Apple genius was so surprised he asked what brand it was and said he would get one. He said most screen protectors are a joke and don't actually prevent cracks when you drop the phone more than 6 inches. Needless to say, we'e repeat customers.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: Best value for glass screen protector on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Techmatte’s amFilm tempered glass screen protector is simply the best value on amazon. Why would you pay $40 at T-Mobile or Verizon when you can literally get better quality for $8? It is so easy to instal and they give you everything you need— wet/dry wipes, microfiber cloth, hard edge cardboard, plenty of instructions , 100% satisfaction guarantee, and the glass is tempered and perfect. I’ve bought for two iPhone and an iPad mini.... the adhesive is perfect, even if you mess up on initial placement and the screen clarity is awesome. DONT SPEND $40 ON A GLASS SCREEN PROTECTOR! Buy this and save yourself some money.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Pioneer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and durable screen protection for iPhone7!
customer_reviews.text: These screen protectors go on smooth and clear. Feels high quality. Lucky they provided a couple of them because I did mess up on the first application. I thought I could just apply it on a brand new iPhone7 out of the box but then realized you really do have to use the included screen cleaner wipes to get the best results without that "rainbow" effect. So clean the screen first with the wipes before you try applying the screen protector or it won't "stick" and will slip and slide. Looks and works great once you do it right and so far I see no scratches, it seems like a durable glass film! Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: MPDZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this protector for my iPhone 8 and received it on time with the box in good condition. I followed directions to install it, but unfortunately because of the rounded screen I could not get the edges to seal creating a "halo ring" effect. I contacted the manufacturer and was quickly helped by one of their representatives. They knew the exact issue I was having and immediately sent me a slightly smaller protector to better fit my screen. I received the new package a few days later, and it was a perfect install! Overall great product and amazing customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Kept my phone safe when it hit the pavement!
customer_reviews.text: This is not my 1st purchase from these guys. They make nice quality screen protectors and have absolutely saved my phone in the past! My boyfriend recently dropped my phone on the cement at a Metallica concert and it looked like my phone completely shattered. When I peeled off the protector my phone was totally fine, the screen protector took all of the damage, like it's supposed to! I ordered a new screen protector and it went on easily with no bubbles. I also like the cleaning accessories that they include. Great value and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: These are the best screen protectors I've found
customer_reviews.text: I never leave my phone without a screen protector on, and these are the brand I usually buy. I've dropped my phone dozens of times and NEVER cracked my screen. If anything, the protector will do its job and crack itself, but leave your phone intact, and it's much cheaper and easier to peel off the film and put a new one on than to fix your phone. One time I dropped my phone so badly I was SURE I shattered the screen, even under the protective film, but when I peeled it off my phone screen was flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 8: Do not buy this product. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: You may be thinking the same thing I was when I saw this product! It has a 4-star rating and you get two screen protectors for under $10. These protectors always come with scuffs, dirt, missing film to protect it, or something else wrong with them. It is ridicolous! They break when being gentle trying to install them. The picture quality of it being on the screen is terrible and the material is horrible. BUYER BEWARE! Do not buy this product. UPDATE: I got a replacement so I will be changing my rating to 3 stars. However, packaging and actual protector still has some small flaws. UPDATE: Another replacement came. Perfect. Satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Cracks easily
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn’t scratch easily, it’s easy to install, but it breaks super easy. As soon as I installed it, it fell out of my pocket when I did a squat and it cracked. After a while I have accidentally dropped my phone and now it’s very cracked. It almost seems as if it’s low resistance. The falls haven’t been hard falls for it to crack like it has, but I also have it on an iphone 7. Therefore, I don’t know if there would have been damage to my phone screen if I didn’t have this on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizet

customer_reviews.title: a bit misleading
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my husband's iphone 6s, which fit well on the screen, but it did not fit my iphone 8 as well. It didn't seal well on the edges. I also find it doesn't allow for ease of texting on my phone either. The word GLASS on the packaging also made me assume it was a glass screen, not just a heavy duty screen saver. I had to go through the first box I purchased by putting on and taking off and luckily purchased a second box which I had to use.
customer_reviews.author: djb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply.  Seems strong!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Looks like this product will be great. Install onto my phone was easy enough. I put it on just a fraction off center, but that was my fault, not the product's fault. The protector doesn't go all the way to the edge of the phone, but with a case, my phone is protected, so I am happy and it seems to fit as described. I have not dropped the phone yet, but I am hopeful that it will do the trick and if anything breaks, it will be the tempered glass, not my screen. If/when I do drop my phone, I will update my review. I have an iphone 7
customer_reviews.author: lisa puccinelli

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased upon high marks from The Wirecutter. Very easy to apply even for someone with no skills and lots of bubble-making (me). Ignore the comments that it doesn't fit the iPhone 7. The box specifically states that it is "slightly smaller...to prevent lifted edges around the perimeter of the phone." It actually worked out very well. I put on my case and then placed the protector with only a small gap between the edge of the glass and the start of the case.
customer_reviews.author: R. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Cracked my original protector so I bought these and installed it myself. It was easy to do and I lined it up straighter than the original was, done at the Verizon store when I bought the phone. The price was very reasonable vs the Verizon store. I had a few tiny bubbles I couldn’t smooth out so I gave up. The next morning all the bubbles were gone and the protector was perfect. I have noticed no glare or problems at all this first week.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: AMFilm iphone 8
customer_reviews.text: just okay screen protector, not edge to edge. comes in a 2 pack, which the first one I have to toss because of dust still on the screen. the dust removal pads they give you are way too small to clean the dust off the screen. the 2nd one attached fine. It dose not seem to show finger prints which is quite nice. 6/18/18 After giving the product 3 stars because I ruined one with bubbles under the glass. Seller contacted me and offered to send me a new package and told me to try and install in the bathroom with steam to cut down on dust. Well I tried it and it worked. Very please with seller.
customer_reviews.author: Donny from RI

customer_reviews.title: Great for Protection, is Clumsy-resistant
customer_reviews.text: I'm Rom Com-levels of clumsy, and shattered my previous screen by losing my balance, dropping my phone face down on pavement, SLIPPING on said phone and falling backwards. So I bought these and dropped the phone several times face down, immediately. There are only two tiny cracks that don't even penetrate the entire screen, and those are cracks NOT on my phone! The two-packs are wise, especially if you are like me and know you will use both.
customer_reviews.author: SarahtheEagle

customer_reviews.title: Great glass
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 packs now. Has saved mine and my wife’s phone on multiple occasions. I have previously used the expensive glass sold at the phone store and cannot really tell a difference in quality. If anything, I like this glass more. It is very easy to install and the kit comes with everything you need. The glass is very responsive and does not impair the function of the phone in any way. I recommend it 5/5
customer_reviews.author: mattihs27

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes, yes! Amazing protection and amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Comes with two prtectors, wipes, dust removing stickers, a card to apply the protector, and step by step instructions. I just took the first one off so I could use the second one and my phone was scratchless and beautiful. The first screen protector took every possible scratch or crack. I could not ask for a better screen protector. I have a picture of the one I just took off so you could see all the damage my screen would have taken had it not been for this protector.
customer_reviews.author: Denisse Manzanilla

customer_reviews.title: Holds up very well
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect on my iPhone for several weeks, including a trip across the country and carrying around on tours, etc. My previous, much more expensive, screen with a warranty (replaced once for a fee, and immediately cracked the replacement) did not last. Very impressed and happy to have a replacement available in the wings, although I may not need it, especially if it doesn't fit whatever I trade up to in a few months. No air bubbles, easily applied, and looks like the original screen- can't even see it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon woman

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I paid $40 for one of these at the Apple store. This product looks and works exactly the same as the overpriced one that cracked. It was not worth getting a replacement under warranty for the other one when this product does the same thing at a fraction of the price and also comes with a warranty. Was super easy to install and I am very happy with this purchase. Highly recommend this product,
customer_reviews.author: T. Roman

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with the quality but it did protect my actual phone screen
customer_reviews.text: I went through both pretty quickly. It did not last long without cracking. However, the second has been cracked on my screen for several months while still keeping my actual screen safe, so if you don’t mind cracks, it might be fine for you. For reference, the protector I had before (I don’t know the company) lasted probably a year without a single crack. This one lasted a few weeks before getting several cracks. I do drop my phone a lot, but compared to the protector I had before, I was not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Protector 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I installed this screen protector on an iPhone 8. The installation instructions were very easy and everything that could possibly be required for a successful installation was included in the box. While the bubble-free installation was a breeze, it was reassuring to know that there was a second screen protector should I fail at my initial install. I'm very happy! Two thumbs up from me! 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Flight Attendant

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB !!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product over a year ago, and had one of the screens on my phone.... went out riding our side x side in the forest, and yep, you guessed it - phone fell out onto the gravel road while moving and landed on the face (were traveling about 25 mph) ! When I retrieved it, screen appeared scratched and cracked all over..... but to my amazement and elation, when I took the glass protector off, my phone and screen were perfect - not a single scratch/mar..... the screen protector was toast, but it did it's job ! I promptly replaced it with the extra I had ..... I will definitely be keeping these on hand !
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Screen Protection
customer_reviews.text: A must-have accessory for your iPhone! If you've ever dropped your phone and developed a small crack, you will wish you had one of these on. Basically the way they work is that when (not IF! This happens to everyone :) you drop your phone, you will crack the cheap screen protector instead of your expensive screen. When you have this phone you really can't even tell it's on there except that you have a little less anxiety when holding your beloved device. :) Good, simple, high quality product with fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel BosticTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cheap! Protects my iPhone 7. Works!
customer_reviews.text: I cracked my $40 Bodyguardz tempered glass screen protector I purchased at AT&T when I bought my iPhone 7. After months of people asking how I cracked my screen, I finally purchased these MUCH cheaper protectors. My coworker peeled off my old screen, used the screen cleaners included in this package, and placed my new screen protector on my phone. It took him about 5 minutes start to finish. I’ve already dropped my phone several times since then, and neither the screen protector nor the phone screen is cracked. There has been no issues with the touch screen sensitivity or responsiveness with this protector.
customer_reviews.author: kahvi79Top Contributor: DC Comics

customer_reviews.title: Installing a screen protector not the easiest thing to do
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on-time, but all of the instructions were inside the sealed package. The product was clean and the enclosed wipes and instructions were very nice. Despite understanding the difficulty of aligning the screen and the well thought installation aids I still managed to place the screen protector about 3/64" to the left which is OK but a lot worse than I thought I could do by bracing my arms and trying to carefully locate the phone so that I could easily see the whole screen. The rest of the install went pretty well with the ability to eliminate the bubbles particularly impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Smiling Bulldog

product_meta.title: amFilm Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 8, 7, 6S, 6 (4.7 Inch)(2 Pack) Tempered Glass Screen Protector
feature_bullets: Specifically designed iPhone 8, 7, 6S, 6 Glass Screen Protector
Ultra-clear High Definition with 99.9% transparency to allow an optimal, natural viewing experience
Ultra thin-0.3mm thickness is reliable and resilient, and promises full compatibility with touchscreen sensitivity
Highly durable, and scratch resistant - surface hardness 9H and topped with oleophobic coating to reduce fingerprints.
Includes: 2x GLASS Screen Protector, Wet/Dry Wipes, Squeeze Card, Easy Installation Use Guide, Dust Removal Stickers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars70,947 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
